name: LanguageNumbers
0:
”Alexa, ask Language Numbers to practice French”
”Alexa, ask Language Numbers to begin practice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: language numbers
des: This skill lets you practice your ability to understand numbers spoken in French, German, Italian, Spanish, and Japanese. The app will speak a number to you in a language you select and you'll have to say what the number is in English.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
